bpm.gateway.core
Class AbstractTransformation

java.lang.Object
  bpm.gateway.core.GatewayObject
      bpm.gateway.core.AbstractTransformation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Transformation, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
AggregateTransformation, Calculation, DataBaseInputStream, DataBaseOutputStream, FieldSplitter, FileCSV, FileXLS, FileXML, Filter, FMDTInput, FMDTOutput, GlobalDefinitionInput, InsertOrUpdate, KPIList, KPIOutput, MergeStreams, RangingTransformation, SelectDistinct, SelectionTransformation, Sequence, SimpleMappingTransformation, SlowChangingDimension2, SortTransformation, SubTransformation
public abstract class AbstractTransformation
extends GatewayObject
implements Transformation

This class is the base class for all Transformations present in a BigateawayModel

Author:
LCA
